<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_liisa_support_ca.LH_Support_Case_Table_Mngt</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>LH_Support_Case_Table_Mngt</name><script><![CDATA[var LH_Support_Case_Table_Mngt = Class.create();
LH_Support_Case_Table_Mngt.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	isPublic: function() {
		return true;
	}

	,updateWatchList: function() {
		var recordUpdated = false;
		var sys_id = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');
		var watch_list = this.getParameter('sysparm_watch_list');
		var gr = new GlideRecord("x_liisa_support_ca_services");

		if(gr.get(sys_id)) {
			gr.setValue("watch_list", watch_list);
			recordUpdated = gr.update()? true : false;
		}

		return recordUpdated;
	}

    ,type: 'LH_Support_Case_Table_Mngt'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-26 07:43:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>a1e821b31b92a150c2e1433be54bcbab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LH_Support_Case_Table_Mngt</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a1e821b31b92a150c2e1433be54bcbab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-26 07:46:10</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
